resources.string: Click Alipay QR code to jump to Alipay\n long press QR code to save to local
Please scan the QR code generated by the sharing schedule.
Unable to scan camera QR code
Scanning the QR code requires the camera, so get camera access
Unable to write access, unable to store QR code
Save the QR code to your phone and need to get write access
Unable to read image without loading permission
Loading images from the system requires read access
Display the number of weeks（ExampleDecember 5th Wednesday 15）
Show the number of weeks (example: Wednesday, December 5)

If there is a problem with the software, you can send feedback via email. 
If you feel that the software has room for improvement, welcome feedback, but please describe in detail what the improvement is to solve. 

Because you still have to go to work, you have to be busy with other things, your feedback will definitely be seen, but I am sorry that I can't reply to you 100%%. The proposed improvement may be adopted or may not be adopted because it is necessary to consider the situation of everyone. Please understand. 

 Feedback Email: itimetable@foxmail.com, please tell me the version number of the software when feedback, current version: %s. 

 Thank you all.
